title: Random Mystery Gift?
body:
I just got a mystery gift and summoner Icon from riot, but I don't know how to tell the mystery gift and I can't see any new icon? Help?

Edit: I already have the Kayle thing

Edit: WHAT THE SHIT I LOOKED THROUGH THE SHOP AND IT SAYS I OWN NURSE AKALI, I NEVER BOUGHT HER. RIOT IS THIS CHRISTMAS GIFTS CONFIRMED?!?! Akali is my second highest mastery lvl and I own crimson

replies.body: Usually purchase history will tell you what the gift was.

In that case if you really wanna know for sure you'll have to submit a ticket and ask. I had that issue with Riot Kayle where it didn't show up in purchase history and I wasn't sure if I already had it so I just had to ask :)

Sounds like it was probs Akali though since you'd notice a new skin on a main, so congrats! No idea what the gift was for though if oyu got your Riot Kayle.
